pullRequest.title: Add Unit support to Config
pullRequest.bodyText: Adds an annotation (like @Range) to specify the units to be displayed in the box. This should lessen confusion on certain config items that have their units hidden by length or by being in the tooltip.

nodes.bodyText:
why is there a default
if you make this String value() then you can just use @Unit("ms")

+package net.runelite.client.config;
+
+import java.lang.annotation.Documented;
+import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
+import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
+import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
+import java.lang.annotation.Target;
+
+/**
+ * Used with ConfigItem, defines what units are shown to the side of the box.
+ */
+@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
+@Target(ElementType.METHOD)
+@Documented
+public @interface Units
+{
+	String name() default "";

commit.message: config: add support for integer config items to have units
